Package edu.matc.controller

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddBudgetItem
    Creates a new BudgetedItem based on the information passed in the request parameters.
    AddBudgetMonth
    Creates a new BudgetMonth based on the information passed in the request parameters.
    AddCategory
    Creates a new Category based on the information passed in the request parameters.
    CreateNewUser
    Creates a new User based on the information passed in the request parameters.
    DeleteBudgetItem
    Deletes the BudgetedItem for the id passed in the request parameters.
    DeleteUser
    Deletes the User for the id passed in the request parameters.
    GetBudgetDetails
    Retrieves the of the budget details for the budget month pass in the request parameters.
    GetRetirementNumbers
    Calls the OCBC retirement api with the information passed in the request parameters.
    SearchBudgetMonths
    Retrieves all of the budget months for the logged in user.
    SearchUser
    Retrieves all of the users.
    UpdateBudgetedItem
    Updates the budgeted item for the information passed in the request parameters.
    UserSignOut
    Signs out the user.
